titleStmt.title: J. B. Cassady to James F. Robinson
CWG8738

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons, Remissions, and Respites, 1862-1863

body.p:
Edmunton Ky Metcalfe Co March ^25th 1863^
To Hon J. F. Roberson

Dear I am personally accquainted with the case presented to your excelency to remit the fine imposed upon Harrison Pointer and would Respectfully Say the cause was mostly through malace and would Say to you that a remision of this fine would be only Justice on all parties concerned and therefore would be glad to hear of the sufer in this fine being released

Very Respectfully your friend
J, B, Cassady

To Hon J F Roberson
Governor of Ky
